entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 05:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -37.8°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
